p:
The effects of each binary mixture were marked as synergistic, antagonistic and no effect based on their calculated χ 2value following the method described by Pavela
52 . χ 2 value was calculated for each combination using following formula.
\documentclass[12pt]{minimal} \usepackage{amsmath} \usepackage{wasysym} \usepackage{amsfonts} \usepackage{amssymb} \usepackage{amsbsy} \usepackage{mathrsfs} \usepackage{upgreek} \setlength{\oddsidemargin}{-69pt} \begin{document}$${{\rm{\chi }}}^{{\rm{2}}}={({{\rm{O}}}_{{\rm{m}}}-{\rm{E}})}^{{\rm{2}}}/E$$\end{document}
χ
2
=
(
O
m
− E
)
2
/ E
where, O m = Observed mortality of A. aegypti in response to binary mixtures.
